ComicInfo.Title: Another Piece of the Action Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary: Another Piece of the Action Part 3: Worf and the crew of the Defiant travel to the previously forbidden world of Talos IV to apprehend fugitive Berlinghoff Rasmussen, but the tables are quickly turned on them due to Talosian illusions.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:00:48. [Issue ID 2590777]
ComicInfo.Characters: Spock,unnamed Talosians,Berlinghoff Rasmussen,B'Elanna Torres,Worf,Nymira (Orion female),Ro Laren,Vice Admiral Kathryn Janeway (illusion),Commander Wiliam T. Riker (illusion),Talosian keeper,Captain Benjamin Sisko (illusion),Captain Christopher Pike (illusion),Hugh
